name: url-blocker-extension
description: Block distracting websites and stay focused

scripts.web-ext:lint: mkdir -p .tmp && cp manifest.json .tmp/ && cp manifest.firefox.json manifest.json && web-ext lint --source-dir . && cp .tmp/manifest.json manifest.json && rm -rf .tmp
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run validate:manifest && npm run web-ext:lint
scripts.package: mkdir -p dist && zip -r dist/url-blocker-v$(node -p "require('./manifest.json').version").zip manifest.json *.js *.html *.css icons/
scripts.package:firefox: mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.firefox.json manifest.json && zip -r dist/url-blocker-firefox-v$(node -p "require('./manifest.json').version").zip manifest.json *.js *.html *.css icons/
